outfit_data.top: A voluminous, black silk blouse with exaggerated puff sleeves and a dramatic off-the-shoulder neckline. The fabric drapes in soft folds and features delicate laser-cut lace detailing along the edges.
outfit_data.bottom: High-waisted, charcoal gray linen pants with a wide leg that tapers dramatically towards the ankle. The pants feature subtle pleats running down the front for added volume and movement.
outfit_data.shoes: Black satin platform pumps with a chunky heel and pointed toe.  The shoes are adorned with silver buckles and have an elongated, sculpted silhouette.
outfit_data.extras: A long, ivory silk scarf with a geometric print in black and white is draped around the neck. Simple silver hoop earrings complete the look.
